lines.text: Now, we'll take our clothes off and we'll feel more comfortable.
The pronoun "we" is misleading unless you propose to take off your clothes too.
You know Bill Holloway? Office Holloway I suppose I should refer to him.
William was one of my pupils.
Well I just thought you might like to know how he's got you up on a pedestal. He says that you're his ideal of "real genteel".
William Holloway started out with a gift rarer than mathematical genius or perfect pitch. A child in whom the ethical instinct was as innate as the function of breathing.
Oh brother! If anyone should ever tell him that, you could drive a truck right between his ears!
Spine straight, Miss Dove; don't wobble about.
It is NOT my custom to wobble.
